welcome.title: Send anonymous feedback to your company
welcome.subtitle: Share honest thoughts, complaints, praise or suggestions without revealing your identity. Your voice matters, and we maintain complete confidentiality.
welcome.codeInvalid: Company not found. Please check the code.
welcome.howItWorksDescription: Simple process for sending anonymous feedback
welcome.getCodeFromHR: Get the code from HR department or company administrator
welcome.passwordInvalid: Invalid password. Please check the password.
welcome.passwordLengthError: Company password must contain exactly 10 characters
welcome.codeLengthError: Company code must contain exactly 8 characters

sendMessage.title: Send Anonymous Message
sendMessage.codeRequired: Please confirm the company code, fill in the message and confirm the terms
sendMessage.companyNotFound: Company not found. Please check the code.
sendMessage.getCodeFromHR: Get the company code from HR department or administrator
sendMessage.saveIdDescription: Your anonymous feedback has been delivered. Save the ID below to check the message status later.
sendMessage.saveIdHint: Save this ID. You will need it to track the status of your feedback.
sendMessage.termsAgreement: I confirm that my message is anonymous and honest. I understand that this feedback will be reviewed by my company's HR department.
sendMessage.anonymousNote: Your message is completely anonymous. No personal information is collected.
sendMessage.step1Description: Get a unique 8-character code from your HR department or company administrator
sendMessage.step2Description: Share honest thoughts, complaints, praise or suggestions. Your message is completely anonymous
sendMessage.step3Description: After sending, you will receive a unique ID to track the status of your feedback
sendMessage.step4Description: Use the received ID to track the status of your message and get a response from the company
sendMessage.checkStatusDescription: Use the 'Check Status' button on the main page and enter this ID
sendMessage.trackResponseDescription: The company may leave a response to your message. Check the status regularly
sendMessage.idSecurityNote: Your ID is secure. It does not contain personal information and is only used to track the status of your message.
sendMessage.messageLimitExceeded: Message limit for this company has been exceeded this month
sendMessage.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

checkStatus.title: Check Message Status
checkStatus.notFound: Message with this ID not found
checkStatus.enterIdDescription: Enter the message ID you received after sending feedback
checkStatus.description: Enter your message ID to track the feedback status

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.passwordMinLengthError: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.passwordRequirementLength: Password must contain at least 8 characters
auth.passwordRequirementUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
auth.passwordRequirementLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
auth.passwordRequirementDigit: Password must contain at least one digit
auth.passwordRequirementSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;:,.<>?)
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.fullAccessDescription: Full access to all features without restrictions
auth.controlPanelDescription: Full access to analytics and settings
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you password reset instructions
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: If the email exists, a password reset link has been sent
auth.resetPasswordError: Error sending email. Please check your email address
auth.resetPasswordEmailError: Failed to send email automatically. Please copy the link manually.
auth.userAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists. Please try logging in or resetting your password.
auth.emailAndPasswordRequired: Email and password are required. Please fill in all fields.
auth.companyCodeAlreadyExists: A company with this code already exists. Please choose a different code.
auth.companyNameAlreadyExists: A company with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
auth.companyEmailAlreadyExists: A company with this email already exists. Please use a different email.
auth.companyConflictError: Data already exists. Please check the uniqueness of the company name, email, and code.
auth.adminNameAlreadyExists: An administrator with this name already exists. Please use a different name.
auth.adminEmailAlreadyExists: An administrator with this email already exists. Please use a different email.
auth.userEmailAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists. Please try logging in or use a different email.
auth.companyFieldsRequired: To create a company, you must provide a name, code, administrator email, and password. Please fill in all fields.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long. Please choose a longer password.
auth.accessDenied: Access denied. You do not have permission to perform this action.
auth.companyCodeLength: Company code must contain exactly 8 characters
auth.resetTokenNotFound: Reset token not found. Please use the link from the email.
auth.passwordMustBeDifferent: New password must be different from current password
auth.notRegisteredAsCompany: Your account is not registered as a company. Please register through the registration form.
auth.verificationEmailSent: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
auth.verifyEmailWait: Please wait while we verify your email address.
auth.emailVerifiedSuccess: Your email has been successfully verified. Redirecting you to the dashboard...
auth.verificationLinkInvalid: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
auth.checkEmailInstruction: Please check your email to verify your account.
auth.verifyEmailBeforeLogin: Please verify your email address before logging in.

company.codeDescription: This code is used by employees to send anonymous feedback. Share it with your team.
company.growthRatingTooltip: Rating is calculated based on response time and resolved problems
company.cultureStrong: Feedback culture in your company is strong
company.trialPeriodDescription: Full access to all features without restrictions until {{date}}. After the trial period ends, the account will automatically switch to the pricing system.
company.trialPeriodAllFeatures: All features are available without restrictions during the trial period

categoryTooltip.reviews: Tracks the total number of reviews from employees. The more reviews, the higher the team's engagement in the feedback system.
categoryTooltip.resolved: Shows the number of resolved issues. Resolving problems raised by employees increases trust and improves the work atmosphere.
categoryTooltip.responseSpeed: Evaluates the speed of your responses to messages. Fast responses (within 24 hours) show that you value employee feedback.
categoryTooltip.activity: Tracks employee activity in the system. Includes weekly and monthly activity, periods without complaints, and consistent activity over several months.
categoryTooltip.quality: Evaluates the quality of your work with feedback. Takes into account the number of praises, percentage of positive reviews, and percentage of resolved issues.
categoryTooltip.longevity: Shows how long your company has been using the platform. Long-term use demonstrates commitment to a feedback culture.

activity.week.description: Get at least 5 messages in a week
activity.month.description: Get at least 10 messages in a month
activity.noComplaintsMonth.description: Spend a month with no complaints from employees
activity.consistent.description: 3 months in a row with activity (minimum 5 messages per month)

longevity.description: Work with the platform for {{target}} months

company.linkDescription: Send this link to employees so they can send anonymous feedback
company.blockedMessage: Your company has been blocked by an administrator. Access to the service is restricted. Please contact us by email.
company.deletedMessage: Your company has been deleted by an administrator. Your account no longer has access to the service. For more information, please contact the administrator.
company.cultureExcellent: Feedback culture in your company is excellent
company.cultureDeveloping: Feedback culture in your company is developing
company.cultureNeedsAttention: Feedback culture in your company needs attention
company.cultureNeedsImprovement: Feedback culture in your company needs improvement
company.howToUseStep2: Send to employees via email, messenger or post on internal portal
company.howToUseStep3: Employees will be able to send anonymous feedback using the code or link
company.logoDescription: Recommended size: 200x200px. Maximum file size: 5MB. Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF.
company.logoInvalidFormat: Unsupported file format. Please use an image (JPG, PNG, GIF).
company.logoTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size: 5MB.
company.emailNotificationsDescription: Receive email notifications about new messages and updates
company.dailyDigestDescription: Receive daily summary of all messages and statistics
company.passwordRequiredForEmailChange: Current password is required to change email
company.passwordRequiredToChangeEmail: Password is required to change email
company.timezoneDescription: Timezone for displaying dates and times
company.dateFormatDescription: Format for displaying dates in the application
company.fullscreenModeDescription: Hide browser elements for maximum workspace. Mode persists after page reload.
company.deleteCompanyWarning: This action cannot be undone. All company data will be permanently deleted.
company.passwordRequiredToDelete: Password confirmation is required to delete the company
company.logoRequirementsHint: Up to 5 MB, formats JPG/PNG/GIF/WebP, ideally square 1:1, minimum 200x200
company.imageProcessingError: Error processing image. Please try another image.

admin.title: Platform Administration
admin.messagesLimitDescription: Maximum number of messages a company can receive on the trial plan per month
admin.deleteMessageConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this message? This action cannot be undone.
admin.messageNotFound: Message not found. It may have already been deleted.
admin.searchMessages: Search by content, ID or company code...
admin.first2MonthsFullAccess: First 2 months after registration - full access without restrictions
admin.firstNDaysFullAccess: First {{count}} {{label}} after registration - full access without restrictions
admin.cannotEditTrialPlan: Regular admins cannot edit trial/free plans
admin.selectFeaturesDescription: Select features that will be available in this plan
admin.trialPeriodEndDescription: After the trial period ends (2 months), the company will automatically be switched to the trial plan with the limitations specified above.
admin.freePlanLimitsDescription: The trial plan has limitations on the number of messages and storage. The company can choose a paid plan to remove limitations.
admin.unlimitedTimeDescription: 0 = unlimited free access period (company will be on free plan until they choose a paid plan)
admin.deleteCompanyWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this company? This action cannot be undone. All company data will be permanently deleted.
admin.blockCompanyWarning: Are you sure you want to block this company? The company will not be able to use the service until unblocked.
admin.unblockCompanyWarning: Are you sure you want to unblock this company? The company will be able to use the service again.
admin.adminNotFound: Administrator not found. They may have already been deleted.
admin.deleteAdminWarning: Are you sure you want to delete administrator "{{name}}" ({{email}})? This action cannot be undone.
admin.name: Name
admin.fullscreenModeDescription: Hide browser elements for maximum workspace. Mode persists after page reload.
admin.emailNotificationsDescription: Receive email notifications about new messages and updates
admin.dailyDigestDescription: Receive daily summary of all messages and statistics
admin.passwordRequiredForEmailChange: Current password is required to change email
admin.passwordRequiredToChangeEmail: Password is required to change email
admin.timezoneDescription: Timezone for displaying dates and times
admin.dateFormatDescription: Format for displaying dates in the application

messages.title: Messages
messages.cannotModifyRejected: This message was rejected by admin. Status and response modification is not available.
messages.searchPlaceholder: Search by content, ID or company code...
messages.emailChangeAuthError: Authentication required. Please log in to change your email.
messages.emailChangeFieldsRequired: Both new email address and current password are required to change your email. Please fill in all fields.
messages.emailChangeInvalidFormat: The email address format is incorrect. Please enter a valid email address (e.g., user@example.com).
messages.emailChangeUserNotFound: User account not found. Please try logging in again.
messages.emailChangeInvalidPassword: The current password you entered is incorrect. Please check your password and try again. Make sure Caps Lock is off and you are using the correct password.
messages.emailChangeSameEmail: The new email address must be different from your current email address. Please enter a different email.
messages.emailChangeEmailInUse: This email address is already registered to another account. Please choose a different email address.

seo.defaultDescription: Send anonymous feedback to your company. Secure platform for honest feedback.
seo.defaultKeywords: feedback, anonymous feedback, HR, company, anonymity, complaints, suggestions, employee feedback
